  "Broker Comment" : "I DISAGREE WITH THE CLIENT'S ALLEGATION DIRECTED AT ME REGARDING \"FAILURE TO SUPERVISE\" AND OBJECT TO BEING NAMED IN THIS MATTER. AS THE FINANCIAL ADVISOR HANDLES THE DAY TO DAY ORDERS WITH THE CLIENT, I WOULD HAVE NO KNOWLEDGE OF ORDERS THAT WERE NOT ENTERED TO THE CLIENT'S SATISFACTION UNLESS THE CLIENT RAISED AN ISSUE SPECIFICALLY.
